summary: This is an internal email correspondence, dated August 12, 2019, providing a timeline of Jeffrey Epstein's arrival and initial housing at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in July 2019. It details his movement from general population to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) and Psychology Observation, clarifying that the latter was not a suicide watch.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email, detailing his arrival and housing status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in July 2019.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: Identified Epstein as a high-profile inmate and ordered his move to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) for safety concerns on July 7, 2019.

connections.description: The Warden made a custodial decision regarding Epstein's housing, moving him to the SHU for safety reasons.

events.title: Epstein arrives at MCC
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein arrived at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York and was initially placed in the Receiving and Discharge area before being moved to general population.

events.title: Moved to Special Housing Unit
events.description: The Warden identified Epstein as high-profile and moved him from general population to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) due to concerns for his personal safety.

events.title: Placed in Psychology Observation
events.description: Epstein was moved to Psychology Observation for evaluation by Psychology Service Staff. The document clarifies this was NOT a suicide watch, and he was under 24-hour observation to assess readiness for SHU.

events.title: Returned to SHU with cell mate
events.description: Epstein was returned to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) with a cell mate, where he remained until July 23, 2019.

keyFacts: Epstein arrived at the MCC on July 6, 2019, and was initially placed in general population because the USMS did not indicate he was high-profile.
The Warden moved Epstein to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) on July 7, 2019, due to safety concerns.
From July 8-10, 2019, Epstein was in Psychology Observation for evaluation, which the document explicitly states was NOT a suicide watch.
Epstein was returned to the SHU with a cell mate on July 10, 2019, and remained there until at least July 23, 2019.
